metadata.Title: CVE-2018-15472 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before 11.1.7, 11.2.x before 11.2.4, and 11.3.x before 11.3.1. The diff formatter using rouge can block for a long time in Sidekiq jobs without any timeout.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Affects GitLab CE/EE 7.6 and later.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
